page.title: 09Recreation,Bromley,S.E.
page.content: At the Greenwood Community Centre,the activities include a Nursery School,a dancing school, a cycling club, a wine club, Morris dancing, flower arranging, a Women's Institute,an over-60's club and a Toc H. Orpington sports club is a private club with football pitches, cricket strips, hockey pitches, a lacrosse pitch and tennis courts. High Elms is an estate of 1000 acres, with a public golf course, and free access to mixed woodland, with an avenue of beech trees and a Nature Trail.High Elms was owned by the Lubbock family. The house was destroyed by fire in 1967. The nearest theatre, cinemas and discos are in Bromley, and there is a Sports Centre with a swimming pool in Orpington.
